##### Science Editorial Lead
PhD in Medical Microbiology and Immunology from the University of Wisconsin-Madison, investigating the immune response to a coronavirus in a mouse model for multiple sclerosis. Biomedical writer and editor, making complex science engaging and accessible for a wide range of audiences, from middle school students to medical professionals. Award-winning author of books for young people.
